page.title: 17THE BOGGS HOLDINGS
page.content: marketed by a cooperative formed to send the fruit to a broader variety of markets down South as Edinburgh could not cope with the quantity supplied at the height of the season and better prices can be had if the fruit is supplied to a larger area than too much in one market.Strawberries are very perishable and must be disposed of quickly.Wages packaging and transport are high.To combat this pick your own was started. People can choose to pick what they require and take it home fresh at what we hope is a fair price.My Great Grandfather,George Prentice,was one of the first small holders coming as many did from The West to try and make a living in the depressed 193Os.Mr Duncanson at The Post Office will be the oldest living original small
